turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Save the Children is an international NGO that is focused on helping the children who live in desperate situations. I think it would be wise of us to be part of this noble cause

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: i completely agree.  it's a crying shame that so many children have to live in terrible circumstances.  these kids have done nothing wrong; it's a terrible situation.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Indeed. This organization relies on our donations to keep it going. Don't you think we should help it

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: without a doubt.  i believe in helping just about any charity; i just wish i had more money to offer.  but i do what i can and charities that involve kids are near the top of my list.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Even a small amount can help much. No donation is small and every penny counts towards helping them

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: that's a wonderful sentiment.  i'd be happy to make a contribution as this sounds like a fine charity that needs assistance.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Glad to hear that there are such kind and caring people like you still live. How much of your incoming payment are you willing to donate today?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: i'd be happy to donate the payment for this hit which is $2

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That is very generous from your side. May God increase your bounty in this life and bestow you with all His Grace. Those children would indeed be grateful for your act

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: thank you so much.  I also believe in God; he is a powerful force in my life and I turn to Him for assistance when i'm in trouble.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Being spiritual helps and most importantly helping the servants of God who are in desperate situation will make you even closer to Him

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I truly believe in God.  I know we are not expected to understand why He does everything the way He chooses but i don't have to know the reasons to know He exists.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I have to tell helping those children will make you feel good in the long-run. That is the power of charitable actions

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: indeed.  that's the beauty of giving to charity.  it helps those who receive as well as those who give.  i have made my share of mistakes in my 62 years but i do my best and I try my best to keep God in mind when i make decisions.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Do you often donate to such charities?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: not as often as i should.  i'm on a very tight budget because i've made some real bad financial decisions through the years.  i do make a donation each month to the KLOVE radio network which is a commercial free religious network.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I understand and I hope everything will turn into its way as soon as you may expect. I want to make everything clear now. Are you willing now to go ahead and make $2 payment to Save the Children organization?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: i certainly am and i look forward to doing so.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: We appreciate your concern and we express our sincere gratitude for your generosity. May God bless you

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: God bless you as well.  it's been a pleasure speaking with you.  all my best
